content.text:
# Draft:Jim Kingston (politician)

James Morris Kingston (born 1990) is an American politician.
James Morris Kingston was born in 1990 and raised in Savannah, Georgia. He is the youngest of four children born to Jack Kingston. He attended Saint Andrew's School, where he was team captain on the football and baseball teams and was elected class president. He graduated in 2009 and attended the University of Georgia, graduating with a bachelor's degree in economics. He worked on his father's 2014 campaign for the U.S Senate.
In 2025, after Buddy Carter, the member of the U.S. House of Representatives for , announced that he would run for the U.S. Senate, Kingston announced his campaign to succeed Carter.
